briefTitle: AMG 162 in the Treatment of Bone Loss in Subjects Undergoing Androgen-Deprivation Therapy for Non-metastatic Prostate Cancer

outcomeMeasures.title: Lumbar Spine Bone Mineral Density Percent Change From Baseline at Month 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Lumbar Spine Bone Mineral Density Percent Chnage From Baseline at Month 24 Assessed by Dual Energy X-Ray Absorptiometry.

outcomeMeasures.title: Femoral Neck Bone Mineral Density Percent Change From Baseline at Month 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Femoral Neck Bone Mineral Density Percent Change From Baseline at Month 24 Assessed by Dual Energy X-Ray Absorptiometry.

outcomeMeasures.title: Total Hip Bone Mineral Density Percent Change From Baseline at Month 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Total Hip Bone Mineral Density Percent Change From Baseline at Month 24 Assessed by Dual Energy X-Ray Absorptiometry.

outcomeMeasures.title: Lumbar Spine Bone Mineral Density Percent Change From Baseline at Month 36
outcomeMeasures.description: Lumbar Spine Bone Mineral Density Percent Change From Baseline at Month 36 Assessed by Dual Energy X-Ray Absorptiometry.

outcomeMeasures.title: Femoral Neck Bone Mineral Density Percent Change From Baseline at Month 36
outcomeMeasures.description: Femoral Neck Bone Mineral Density Percent Change From Baseline at Month 36 Assessed by Dual Energy X-Ray Absorptiometry.

outcomeMeasures.title: Total Hip Bone Mineral Density Percent Change From Baseline at Month 36
outcomeMeasures.description: Total Hip Bone Mineral Density Percent Change From Baseline at Month 36 Assessed by Dual Energy X-Ray Absorptiometry.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Any Fracture Through Month 36
outcomeMeasures.description: Any fracture includes osteroporotic fractures at any site excluding skull, facial, mandible, metacarpals, finger phalanges, and toe phalanges.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With a New Vertebral Fracture Through Month 36
outcomeMeasures.description: New Vertebral Fracture Assessed by Lateral Spine X-ray using Genant Semiquantitative Scoring Method excluding any symptomatic new vertebral fracture associated with high trauma severity or a pathologic fracture.

outcomeMeasures.title: Time to First Clinical Fracture Through Month 36
outcomeMeasures.description: A clinical fracture was defined as any nonvertebral fracture or clinically evident fracture at the cervical vertebrae, thoracic vertebrae, and lumbar vertebrae that was associated with signs and/or symptoms indicative of a fracture. Fractures associated with high trauma severity and pathologic (ie, metastatic) fractures were excluded. Since the median time was not reached, time to first clinical fracture is represented by the Kaplan-Meier estimate of the percentage of participants with a clinical fracture.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Any Fracture Through Month 24
outcomeMeasures.description: Any fracture includes osteroporotic fractures at any site excluding skull, facial, mandible, metacarpals, finger phalanges, and toe phalanges.
